p:
The animal model was constructed as described previously
10 . The animal experiment protocol was approved by the Committee on the Use and Care of Animals (Chongqing Medical University, Chongqing, China). The SKOV3 ovarian cancer cell line was transfected with LV2-1 or LV2-NC. Thereafter, BALB/c nude mice (6-week old) were intraperitoneally injected with SKOV3 cells. The mice were killed after 5 weeks, and the number of ascites was determined.
